message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for offering! That price is a little high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $18,000 to make it worth my while.
I appreciate you working with me.  How about we settle at $13,000?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need a bit more to make it worth my while. I can do $16,000, but that's as low as I can go.
Okay, this is my final offer.  I'll do $14,000.
I'm not going to go any lower than $15,500. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
